New York City braces for brutal cold and high winds on New Year's Eve, while a tragic fire in the Bronx claims a life; additionally, significant updates include a federal judge's ruling on immigrant Medicaid data sharing and a new emergency fund for transgender care announced by Mayor Adams.

### Risks & Alerts

- Brutal cold expected for New Year's Eve with 40-50 mph wind gusts slamming NYC. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikwFBVV95cUxPVlVZeVZKdTFrNkRtM1A0Nm5oazBQX0NwTkVtMENJdllSRWpBZkNlWm1fVHgtSHpsYjRRZ0I5M3JoNDJ5ak90MWtfUTZ0WE5aUmowMGxydE1rMHNBN0JSVURvUVUxQXdqd2tBUENTd3g5SW14RTFINTdxTzdSTXNnMVY3d0JNZ0xTZXdHVVBHbFVIa2s?oc=5)
- Wind advisory in effect for Staten Island; gusts up to 50 mph and flurries possible. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Hundreds in Brooklyn without power as crews work to restore service. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMilgFBVV95cUxQc0wyVnE2NFk3S2dJRi1QRVBCa0hpaXVPMkV4Q3hyQm1LM25rMGxENVpabnF0aGlHa2M2QWgzekN1UkdfY094aERVbndibk1kT0JXb2thVHd2LUtoMlg3cnk0Uk44Vl9JOGZIYmZUMDhFQk8td3hDU29QWVZ6bkx1Y240Y3hURnVpNGgtbnlhZy1tZjhDVUE?oc=5)
- Man, 70, dies as fire tears through Bronx NYCHA apartment. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiogFBVV95cUxNVWk1RVVISHpGbUItU3RESDdsMU9sMHc0WjhWRkZRTXByOUV3VnZCY2E3YUFGalhVRE05TmpZNHpGWmt5bEV2RG1uVzhyc1N0YjlrREx0ckhkdFdUM3BJaERYN1NaTENjUnVVZlBLdFd0T0lMa3h6SnZjTmRjZ1JGRFZSM0xGb09sRVh6UnY3VVdoR2pHNnFoN2tPbFlKSTFyX2c?oc=5)
- Firefighters battle two-alarm blaze on Palisades Avenue. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiX0FVX3lxTE1EamhIWmZXcmV6dW5xbkRILWRPVFNnVHlGbHBHSnFLellqNGVHVnhYREJCb2VuSVVtQTcwTWpsNEM4VlR2RHJnNk1pUG5YZEVUcmNGNTFDaWRwY0RHODIw?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics

- Federal judge allows sharing of NY immigrants' Medicaid data with ICE, raising privacy concerns. - City health commissioner warns that 2026 will be a 'treacherous' year for public health. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipgFBVV95cUxOdFJQajBnSjgyR3BQYV8yNjYzanhPOUs3bWt4T3VsMS1CdFg3UjVINFZRcHRLMjk3dVBqYWhIQ1BqN0JJQ3JUQ1lyUndSWktLU1hIS1ZoY2Q1QkZKTDZYUkpLam50MGUyWXdRelJHWVF0Y0VVQi02aDJ5dU1yZHVOa3hnX2tTUGFqRl9JWWRVVnlSOV9XVktvY0JTeVUtM2E3Q3RGRVRB?oc=5)
- Mayor calls for relocation of MTA bus depot from Westchester to NYC following recent crash. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxNN0RSbW9sZWVFWHJPbWVqeTlxWFNyaDZhaUF4blI2LUhGVGdTcS14aHNhQnkzLWZrOE8yMVJPQkN3b29NclRQYm16RmJybHJYV3VhZkVvRFpCdDhVRlBhMTdXWmdRUWlPNjQzSUZIMDYyWTMwNHM1SzA2bVBzSE5oZy1JdWxEUnFGRWN6RkFiejgzVWtjeWcyaERSN0NKOG1YNTBpNXhjbUVlQmNvdjVub3p4TQ?oc=5)
- Governor Hochul announces crackdown on toll enforcement, resulting in 170 vehicle seizures statewide. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC's top prosecutors agree to rollback discovery reform, impacting legal processes. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiqAFBVV95cUxQRGdWNDN4NlNocGFDLURMSG1ZcGlubmcyQXB5bHkxclpnOHFxNWZRd2FTVDM0eTJwaTIzU0lQQzFrenVaX2hScndGX0RnTGNIcUZFNjRoTU1fZ2xCUlViMXNmNkM1NFhRTHJBVlFLTjlDcXVtV3pxVmNwTU51QjFDaFpkSG9pdG5PM0xmbzV4SGJiQWJrb05WWTRpNjMtTmhEZjJITGhPVXg?oc=5)
